explanations.machine learning: The paper explicitly mentions using machine learning approaches to verify the results obtained from the modified Black-Scholes Option pricing model.
explanations.decision tree: The paper adopts different algorithms including decision tree as part of the machine learning approach.
explanations.neural network: The paper mentions using neural network as one of the algorithms in the machine learning approach.
explanations.ensemble learning method: The paper refers to ensemble learning method as one of the adopted algorithms in the machine learning approach.
